page.title: 14Cullyhanna Superstitions (2)
page.content: If a child is born on Whit Sunday, it is said that such a person will become dangerous and take a life.To nullify this we have heard of people killing a chicken in the hands of an infant born on this day.On New Year's Day,there are some people who do not care to see any person outside their own household enter the house on that day _ a red headed woman particularly,but it is considered lucky for a dark person to be the first to enter.Men have been known to turn back from a journey when they met a red _ headed woman within the first three miles.It is unlucky to take a cat with a flitting and no beggar should be turned away from the door empty handed.If you say aloud that you mean to exterminate rats, the rats will not touch the traps,and at midnight on Christmas Eve,an ass bends on its forelegs in memory of Bethlehem
